Package eu.opends.hmi

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HMICenter
    This class reports collisions with triggers placed in the model to the SIM-TD HMI.
    HMIThread
    Once activated, HMIThread sends continuously updates to the HMI controller, until the approximation is below the given minimum.
    LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a local danger warning.
    PresentationModel
    Abstract class used to compute the distance between the moving car and any target position.
    RedTrafficLightPresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a red traffic light warning.
    RoadWorksInformationPresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a construction site warning.
    SituationEvaluationPresentationModel  
    SpeedLimitPresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a speed limit warning.
    TrafficLightPresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a traffic light phase assistant.
